data.message: Hey Facebook please help my account compromised and I can not restore I have tried in every way to restore and did not work, but I think there is one way to recover by ip computer user to log on and this is my account breached https://www.facebook.com/mohanad.ramadan.967

replies.message: Hi Ahmeed. If your account was taken over by someone else, you should first secure your account to make sure no one else has access to it. If you can't access your account, you can follow this link to secure it: http://on.fb.me/1tec0JE -Elissa
